src_original: 4. tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddhaviśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣādyaviruddhaḥ /
yathā dharmī śabdo 'nitya iti viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ sādhyaḥ /
5. kaḥ punaḥ sapakṣaḥ /  sādhyadharmasāmānyena samānaḥ sapakṣaḥ /  yathā ghaṭādiriti //
1. sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ caiva sābhāsaṃ parasaṃvide /  pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca sābhāsaṃ tvātmasaṃvide //
ayaṃ śāstrārtharāṃgrahaḥ //  2. vādinā svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭo 'rthaḥ sādhyaḥ /  yena sādhyate tatsādhanam //  3. hetostrairūpyamucyate /
kiṃ punastattrairūpyam /  pakṣe sattvameva prathamaṃ rūpam /  sapakṣa eva sattvamiti dvitīyaṃ rūpam /  vipakṣe ca asattvameva niścitamiti tṛtīyaṃ rūpam //
